content:
```bibtex
@article{Riccardi1989,
    author = {Giovanna Riccardi and Edda de Rossi and Anna Milano},
    title = {Amino acid biosynthesis and its regulation in cyanobacteria},
    journal = {Plant Science},
    volume = {2},
    pages = {135-151},
    year = {1989},
    publisher = {Elsevier BV},
    doi = {10.1016/0168-9452(89)90018-6},
    url = {https://doi.org/10.1016/0168-9452(89)90018-6},
    abstract = {This article discusses the biosynthesis of amino acids in cyanobacteria and the regulatory mechanisms involved. It provides insights into the metabolic pathways and the genetic control of amino acid production in these microorganisms.}
}
```
